Name: Gulf Coast Sex on the Beach
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
22.5 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Golden tan in colour and tropical in flavour, complete with frothy top.
History: Created in 1997 by Roberto Canino and Wayne Collins at Navajo Joe, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Gulf Coast Sex on the Beach contains 262 calories
